description: Lime Rickey is a refreshing summer drink. It has gin, lime juice, club soda, and lime slices as its ingredients. This cocktail can also be made by adding sugar or artificial sweetener.
name: Lime Rickey

recipeInstructions.name: Pour lime juice and gin into a cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour lime juice and gin into a cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice cubes and shake well for about 30 seconds.
recipeInstructions.text: Add ice cubes and shake well for about 30 seconds.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the lime juice mixture over an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Top with soda water.
